Tanggapan Pengembang soal Satpam Usir PKL dengan Tabrakkan Motor ke Gerobak
04 Nov 2019, 19:17 by Isal Mawardi
Bekasi - Pihak PT Hasanah Damai Putra memberi tanggapan soal penertiban PKL yang dilakukan oleh salah satu satpamnya, Sugeng. Sugeng mengusir PKL dengan cara menabrakkan motor ke gerobak pedagang bakso.
Staf Humas Damai Putra Group Claudia, menyebutkan sekuriti PT Hasanah Damai Putra sedang melakukan penertiban PKL pada Minggu (3/11). Namun, seorang pedagang bakso bernama Soleh tak mau ditertibkan.
"Memang untuk area kita di Harapan Indah clear area untuk pedagang kaki lima. Kemarin itu ada banyak banget PKL di sana, jadi ditertibin lah sama sekuritinya, untuk yang lain mereka sudah pergi, pas untuk bapak Soleh ini, sudah ditegur sampai 3 kali, memang masih tetap ada di situ," ujar Claudia saat dihubungi detikcom, Senin (4/11/2019).
Setelah terjadi perdebatan, satpam langsung menaiki motornya dan menabrakkan motornya ke gerobak pedagang bakso. "Memang seperti itu ya (menabrak dengan motor). Menabrak gerobaknya (PKL)," ujar Claudia.
Baik Soleh maupun Sugeng tidak terluka dalam kejadian itu. Mediasi juga telah dilakukan oleh kedua belah pihak.
"Tadi pagi, sudah selesai antara sekuritinya dan pak Soleh nya datang ke kami, sudah berdamai secara kekeluargaan dan sudah ada pergantian kerugian (gerobak yang rusak)," ujar Claudia.
Claudia tak menjelaskan detail soal biaya ganti rugi. Claudia menyebut, Soleh juga sudah menanda tangani persetujuan tak lagi berjualan di kawasan tersebut.
"Pak Solehnya tidak memperpanjang masalahnya, dan itu sudah ada surat kayak pernyataan Pak Soleh sendiri sih. Isinya, bahwa Bapak Soleh tidak akan berjual lagi di area yang dilarang untuk kaki lima dan tidak akan memperpanjang masalahnya," ujar Claudia.

Developer's response to the security guard driving out street vendors by crashing motorcycles into carts
Nov 04 2019, 19:17 by Isal Mawardi
Bekasi - PT Hasanah Damai Putra gave a response about the curbing of street vendors conducted by one of its security guards, Sugeng. Sugeng drove out the street vendors by crashing his motorcycle into the meatball vendor's cart.
Staff of Damai Putra Group, Claudia, stated that PT Hasanah Damai Putra security was conducting street vendors control on Sunday (3/11). However, a meatball trader named Soleh did not want to be put in order.
"Indeed, for our area in Harapan Indah, clear the area for street vendors. Yesterday there were lots of street vendors there, so they were disciplined by the security, for others they had already left, right for Mr. Soleh, reprimanded 3 times, indeed it still remains there, "Claudia said when contacted by AFP on Monday (11/04/2019).
After a debate, the security guard immediately boarded his motorcycle and crashed his motorcycle into a meatball merchant's cart. "It's like that (crashing with a motorcycle). Crashing into the cart (street vendors)," said Claudia.
Neither Soleh nor Sugeng were injured in the incident. Mediation has also been carried out by both parties.
"This morning, it was finished between the security forces and Mr. Soleh came to us, had made peace in a family manner and there was already a change in losses (the wagon that was broken)," Claudia said.
Claudia did not explain the details of compensation costs. Claudia said, Soleh had also signed an agreement to stop selling in the area.
"Mr. Soleh did not prolong the problem, and there was already a letter like Mr. Soleh's statement anyway. It contained, that Mr. Soleh would not sell anymore in areas that are prohibited for street vendors and would not extend the problem," said Claudia.
